sanjiwa bandara yanu anthar wishwawidyaliya shishya bala mandalaye kadawumkaru ya.anawasara raswim sanwidhanaya kirima, mahajanaya apahasuwata pathwana se udghoshana sanwidhanaya kirima athulu chodana ella karamin ohu rimand bharayata path kara atha.ohuta kisindu wishwa widyalayakata athulu wima thahanam kara athi athara sathi thunakata warak iru dinayaka polisiyata gos thama jiwath wana bawath panagos nathi bawath sanatha kala yuthuya.kese wethath eki kriya marga hethu kotagena lankawe mini maraganim sighra lesa aduwanu atha.prajathanthrawadi rataka pradhana lakshanayak wana nithiya idiriye siyalloma eka samana wima lankawe kriyathmaka wana bawata hondama udaharanaya sanjiwa bandara ath adanguwata ganimaya.anthare wewa kumana ho shishya sangamayaka kandawum karuweku wu pamanin nithiya ohuta wisheshayak kirimata sudanam nathi bawa penwa demin ohuta panawu dandanaya samastha shri lankikayin dohoth mudun di anumatha kala yuthuya.

dharma deshanawa kotugoda dhammawasa anunahimiyan wisin pawathwanu labe.sawasa 1.00 shri kalyanadharma peramune maha sabha raswima pawathwe.edina dawasa pura le dandime pinkamak, panas namakata dawal sanghika danayath, asarana pawul 50 kata wiyali aahara beda dimath, sawasa 5.00 peraharath , rathri 7.00 bodhi pujawa ha thesaththanyana pujawath , (meheyawima : nauyane ariyadhamma nahimi) ,rathri 10.00 sarwarathrika pirith deshanayak pawathwe.kiriwehera rajamahawiharadhipathi, abhinawaramadhipathi, guwan sewa amathyathuma, thapal amathyathuma , pashusampath amathyathuma, jalasampath amathyathuma athulu prabhu pirisak eeta sahabhagiwimata niyamithaya.27 wana dina aluyama 4.00 pawidi kirime pinkamak aluyama 5.00 kiri aahara ha atapirikara pujawa pawathwa, rajayatath aarakshaka hamudawantath, lakwasi samatath seth pathimak sunamiyen miyagiya ayata punyanumodana kirimak sidu kare.rathri 7.00 rathnapura maha saman dewalaye wishesha pujawak pawathwimen pasudina kiri aahara pujawath, asaranayin wenuwen mahadanayakuth pawathwa lak wasi samata seth pathima da sidu kare.
